definitions.definition: to think that something is likely to be true:
examples: [ + (that) ] Dan didn't answer his phone, so I suppose (that) he's busy.

definitions.definition: used to show that you think something is true, although you wish that it were not:
examples: I suppose (that) all the tickets will be sold by now.
I suppose (that) you're going to be late again.

definitions.definition: used to show unwillingness to agree:
examples: "Can I go out tonight?" "Oh, I suppose so."
I don't suppose (that) you could lend me £5 till tomorrow?

definitions.definition: used at the beginning of a sentence or clause to mean 'what would happen if':
examples: Suppose we miss the train - what will we do then?
